name: Fat Stacks
description:
Introduction

Fat Stacks is the continuation of an older project Silly's Playhouse. With Fat Stacks, I hope to demonstrate better level quality, and a more lively environment!

Description

My level takes place in the late 1970s in a disheveled Jewelry Warehouse. You have teamed up with your tiny rodent friend, Chase Whiskers, to clean the place out!

You must use the Snatch Gun to steal the gems and reach the exit. The gun allows the user to loot groups consisting of at least three identical and adjacent objects.

Credits Programming & Design

Kevin Fischer, David Milne

Modeling & Texture

Maysue Lee, Juliet Cortes, Sahsahak "Sun" Thossa,

Production & Sound

David Milne, Kevin Fischer

Writing & Art

Production & PR

Special Thanks

In memory of Clint DiClimenti
